MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Brackenhill Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.30pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to investigate and repair an underground cable fault on Brackenhiill Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:26PM on Friday 05 February 2021.
